id: California teacher caught on camera punching 14-year-old boy
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Amir Vera, CNNUpdated 9:57 AM ET, Mon November 5, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)A teacher and student at a southeast Los Angeles, California, high school came to blows Friday afternoon, and it was all caught on video. CNN's Blair Johnson and Jennifer Selva contributed to this report.
